mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${prefix}entityAssnQuals ( entityAssnQualsGuid, referenceGuid, qualifierName, qualifierValue, entryStateGuid ) VALUES ( #{uid,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}, #{referenceUId,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}, #{qualifierName}, #{qualifierValue}, #{entryStateUId,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
WHERE referenceGuid IN ( SELECT eate.entityAssnsGuid
FROM ${prefix}entityAssnsToEntity eate
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eate.associationPredicateGuid
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} )

DELETE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
INNER JOIN ${prefix}entityAssnsToEntity eate ON ${prefix}entityAssnQuals.referenceGuid = eate.entityAssnsGuid
INNER JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eate.associationPredicateGuid INNER JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}

DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
WHERE referenceGuid IN ( SELECT eatd.entityAssnsDataGuid
FROM ${prefix}entityAssnsToData eatd
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eatd.associationPredicateGuid
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} )

DELETE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
INNER JOIN ${prefix}entityAssnsToData eatd ON ${prefix}entityAssnQuals.referenceGuid = eatd.entityAssnsDataGuid
INNER JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eatd.associationPredicateGuid INNER JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}

DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
WHERE referenceGuid IN ( SELECT eate.entityAssnsGuid
FROM ${prefix}entityAssnsToEntity eate
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eate.associationPredicateGuid LEFT JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND rel.relationGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} )

DELETE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
INNER JOIN ${prefix}entityAssnsToEntity eate ON ${prefix}entityAssnQuals.referenceGuid = eate.entityAssnsGuid
INNER JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eate.associationPredicateGuid INNER JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND rel.relationGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}

DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
WHERE referenceGuid IN ( SELECT eatd.entityAssnsDataGuid
FROM ${prefix}entityAssnsToData eatd
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eatd.associationPredicateGuid
LEFT JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND rel.relationGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} )

DELETE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals
INNER JOIN ${prefix}entityAssnsToData eatd ON ${prefix}entityAssnQuals.referenceGuid = eatd.entityAssnsDataGuid
INNER JOIN ${prefix}associationPredicate ap ON ap.associationPredicateGuid = eatd.associationPredicateGuid INNER JOIN ${prefix}relation rel ON ap.relationGuid = rel.relationGuid
WHERE rel.codingSchemeGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND rel.relationGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}
DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals WHERE referenceGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND qualifierName != 'usageContext'
DELETE FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals WHERE referenceGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND qualifierName = 'usageContext'
mapper.select: SELECT assnQual.entityAssnQualsGuid, assnQual.referenceGuid, assnQual.qualifierName, assnQual.qualifierValue, assnQual.entryStateGuid esGuid FROM ${prefix}entityAssnQuals assnQual WHERE assnQual.referenceGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler}
mapper.update: UPDATE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals SET entryStateGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} WHERE referenceGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND qualifierName != 'usageContext'

UPDATE ${prefix}entityAssnQuals SET entryStateGuid = #{param2,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} WHERE referenceGuid = #{param1,handler=variablePrimaryKeyTypeHandler} AND qualifierName = 'usageContext'
